abstract: A polite, pointed exchange between two men who represent differing sides of the issues raised by the Occupy Wall Street protests.
snippet: A polite, pointed exchange between two men who represent differing sides of the issues raised by the Occupy Wall Street protests.
lead_paragraph: Two men at Zuccotti Park in Lower Manhattan on Thursday could hardly have looked more different.

headline.main: Opposite Sides of the Protest Come Together, Briefly
